fields.name: ASUS Vivobook 17 X1704VA-AU456 Quiet Blue
fields.description: The tactile sensation of a keyboard depends on the relationship between the ultimate force (also known as pressure force) and the contact force. Limiting force occurs when you press a key and reach the maximum force that the rubber cap underneath the key can withstand without deforming. Contact force occurs when the bottom of the key touches the printed circuit board and generates an electronic signal, which in turn triggers the action associated with that key. To achieve the most natural keyboard experience possible, ASUS has scientifically determined that the optimal ratio of these forces is 45-60% for ergonomics. These forces are precisely measured and adjusted using ASUS-designed rubber caps under the keys.
fields.short_description: The Quiet Blue laptop has a 17-inch screen

fields.name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro 128GB Black Titanium
fields.description: Black titanium not only gives the device a stylish look, but also makes it incredibly durable. The hardened ceramic coating on the display protects the device from scratches and drops. The iPhone 16 Pro meets IP68 water and dust resistance standards, allowing it to withstand immersion up to 6 metres for 30 minutes.
fields.short_description: A powerful smartphone with a 6.1-inch display and 128 GB of memo

fields.name: ASUS TUF Gaming F17 FX707VV-HX142 Mecha Gray
fields.description: Get right into the action with the TUF Gaming F17 laptop. With the Intel Core i9-13900H processor and 32 gigabytes of fast DDR5-4800 RAM in the maximum configuration, you can stream video and work on multiple Windows 11 apps with ease. Unleash your full gaming potential with the GeForce RTX 4060 laptop graphics card, complemented by the dedicated MUX Switch. When your gaming library is full, you can expand your storage with an empty M.2 slot for an NVMe SSD.
fields.short_description: A gaming laptop with a 17.3-inch screen and a powerful processor
